thread.title: Roger Netherland
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Roger Netherland

author: Roger Netherland
title: Roger Netherland
text: Bought a living room set from the Taylor store. Sales rep Ceasar was very helpful, no pressure, fair price for the quality. Finance was easy very convenient. Delivery was quick and on time. Delivery guys were very careful and professional. Would go there for sure when we have other furniture needs.
